meanings.definition: Resembling or having the color of an olive.
meanings.sent1: The olivaceous walls of the house blended well with the surrounding trees.
meanings.sent2: Her olivaceous scarf matched perfectly with her outfit.
meanings.sent3: The olivaceous cat thought it was hiding, but its color gave it away against the grass.
meanings.sent4: The olivaceous hills rolled gently in the distance, like giant olives in a vast salad bowl.
meanings.sent5: The olivaceous paint on the old barn peeled off in the summer heat, revealing layers of history.
